author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NCR Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.35
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - NCR Corp:
* NCR ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.56
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 * Q1 REVENUE $1.52 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.47 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.45 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.60 TO $0.65
* SEES Q2 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 TO $0.30 * FOR Q2 OF 2018, REVENUE GROWTH IS EXPECTED TO BE DOWN 1% TO UP 1%
* “WE ARE REAFFIRMING OUR FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
